elements.buttonText: Proceed to next round of training

prompt_buyer_choice_to_hire.name: buyer_choice_to_hire
prompt_buyer_choice_to_hire.prompt:
## You have finished the Labeling Game. 🥳

Now we would like you to play the Art Buying game.

This game has several roles.

We will run you through some training rounds so you can understand each role before we begin.

## Training round 1: Play as Buyer

You want to buy this piece of art on display at a gallery in New York:

![purchase image](projects/volvovsky_reputation/Tangram_A5.jpg)

Since you can't travel to the gallery, you need to decide whether to pay an agent **50 points** to purchase the art for you or to forgo the opportunity.

_This is a training round, so the agent will be played by a bot:_

![robot image](projects/volvovsky_reputation/robot_icon.jpg)

If the agent buys the correct art piece, you will get **80 points**. Otherwise, you get nothing.

If you hire the agent, you will likely be able to hire them again to purchase other pieces. However, if you decide not to hire them, you won't get another chance to buy this piece of art, or to work with this agent in the future.

Would you like to hire the agent to purchase this art for you?

_As this is a training round, select "Yes"_
responses: Yes
No

prompt_buyer_description.name: buyer_description
prompt_buyer_description.prompt:
Now that you have decided to hire the agent, you need to tell them which piece of art you want them to buy.

In the box below, describe the artwork above using **15** characters or less.
responses: Describe the artwork in 15 characters or less

prompt_agent_intro_taxi.name: agent_intro_taxi
prompt_agent_intro_taxi.prompt:
## Training round 2: Play as Agent

In this phase, you are playing as the **agent** in the art game.

_This is a training round, so the buyer will be played by a bot:_

![robot image](projects/volvovsky_reputation/robot_icon.jpg)

A potential buyer has paid you **50 points** to hire you to purchase a piece of art, in addition to the money to buy the art. They have described the piece of art they want in a text message.

Unfortunately, you left your phone at home, with their description of the art piece. The gallery is going to close soon, so the only way you can get your phone in time is to pay **30 points** for a taxi home and back.

Alternatively, you can keep those 30 points, and buy whichever art piece you guess the buyer wants.

Just know, this is a prolific buyer who buys many pieces of art, and may want to hire you again in the future. If you get the wrong piece of art, the buyer might not want to hire you again.

Are you going to **pay 30 points** to take a taxi home to get your phone?

_As this is a training round, select "Yes"_
responses: Yes
No

prompt_exit_3_Play_as_Agent_part_2_proje.name: exit_3_Play_as_Agent_part_2_projects/volvovsky_reputation/play_as_agent_task.md
prompt_exit_3_Play_as_Agent_part_2_proje.prompt:
# Great, you got your phone! The message from the buyer (the bot player) is:

# > `I want to buy the piece that looks like a "Banana"`.

# Please select the image to purchase from the set below:

![Choices](projects/volvovsky_reputation/Tangram_Panel_A.jpg)

prompt_art_game_comp_1.name: art_game_comp_1
prompt_art_game_comp_1.prompt: ## The buyer gets rewarded with 80 points only if:
responses: The agent buys a piece of art
The agent spends 30 points to get a cab home so that he can read the buyer’s message
The agent buys the correct piece of art
The buyer re-hires the agent
prompt_art_game_comp_1.value: The agent buys the correct piece of art

prompt_art_game_comp_2.name: art_game_comp_2
prompt_art_game_comp_2.prompt: ## The agent gets paid 50 points by the buyer only if:
responses: The agent spends 30 points to get a cab home so that he can read the buyer’s message
The agent buys the correct piece of art
The buyer hires the agent at the beginning of the round
prompt_art_game_comp_2.value: The buyer hires the agent at the beginning of the round

prompt_art_game_comp_3.name: art_game_comp_3
prompt_art_game_comp_3.prompt: ## After the agent chooses a piece of art and the buyer sees the result:
responses: The buyer has another opportunity to hire THE SAME AGENT to buy another piece of art, or terminate the art game
The buyer has another opportunity to hire A DIFFERENT AGENT to buy another piece of art, or terminate the art game
The buyer and agent trade places
prompt_art_game_comp_3.value: The buyer has another opportunity to hire THE SAME AGENT to buy another piece of art, or terminate the art game

prompt_art_game_comp_4.name: art_game_comp_4
prompt_art_game_comp_4.prompt: ## If the buyer decides not to hire the agent:
responses: The buyer will get an opportunity to hire a different agent.
The Art Game will end
The buyer will play as an agent with someone else

prompt_art_game_comp_5.name: art_game_comp_5
prompt_art_game_comp_5.prompt: ## The buyer can see whether the Agent decides to spent 30 points to get a cab home so that he can read the Buyer’s message:
responses: True, the buyer can see whether the agent went home to read the message before buying a piece of art.
False, the buyer can only see whether the agent bought the correct piece of art
prompt_art_game_comp_5.value: False, the buyer can only see whether the agent bought the correct piece of art

elements.buttonText: Proceed to next round of training

prompt_postObservation_choice.name: postObservation_choice
prompt_postObservation_choice.prompt:
**The buyer you were observing doesn't want any more art.**

## Now it's your turn. Do you want to hire the agent you observed to buy art for you?

![elephant image](projects/volvovsky_reputation/agent_elephant.jpg)

As a reminder, it costs **50 points** to hire them.

If they buy the right piece, you get **80 points**. Otherwise, you get nothing.
responses: Yes
No

prompt_exit_14_manipulation_check_projec.name: exit_14_manipulation_check_projects/volvovsky_reputation/manipulation_check_agent.md
prompt_exit_14_manipulation_check_projec.prompt: ## Was the AGENT you observed in the Art Buying Game someone you had worked with before in the Labeling Game?
responses: Yes
No

prompt_exit_14_manipulation_check_projec.name: exit_14_manipulation_check_projects/volvovsky_reputation/manipulation_check_buyer.md
prompt_exit_14_manipulation_check_projec.prompt: ## Was the BUYER you observed in the Art Buying Game someone you had worked with before in the Labeling Game?
responses: Yes
No

elements.buttonText: Proceed to next round of training
